full_description:
ASUS Prime 850W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply

The ASUS Prime 850W 80 Plus Gold Modular Power Supply will provide your workstation the power it needs to operate all of your apps and more. This power supply, designed for productivity workstations, supports the majority of mid-range graphics cards and provides enough power for your motherboard's operations. With a single 850W +12V rail, it can handle a lot of parts, including your graphics card, motherboard, storage devices, and more. By allowing you to select just the wires you want, a modular design clears up internal clutter and increases airflow within the case. There are several PCIe, SATA, and peripheral ports to power various components, but just one 16-pin 12VHPWR connector is meant for different NVIDIA graphics cards. With the 80 Plus Gold certification, you may achieve excellent efficiency, with up to 90% and 87% efficiency at half and full working loads, respectively. A 135mm internal fan that uses a twin ball bearing arrangement to provide a longer lifespan for long-lasting performance keeps your system cool.

full_description:
ASUS TUF Gaming 850G 850W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply

The ASUS TUF Gaming 850G 850W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply is a powerhouse of a component, specifically tailored to meet the demanding needs of gamers and PC enthusiasts. What truly sets it apart is its impressive array of features that ensure top-tier performance and rock-solid reliability. it boasts the coveted Military-grade Certification, a testament to the ruggedness and resilience of its capacitors and chokes. These critical internal components have undergone rigorous testing to withstand the harshest conditions, guaranteeing not just longevity but also unwavering performance under the most demanding loads. Enhancing its durability further, the inclusion of dual ball fan bearings is a standout feature. Unlike traditional sleeve-bearing designs, these dual ball fan bearings can last up to twice as long, ensuring your power supply remains efficient and reliable throughout its extended lifespan. The ASUS TUF Gaming 850W Gold doesn't stop there in terms of protection. It features a robust PCB coating, designed to shield against moisture, dust, and extreme temperature variations. This additional layer of safeguarding ensures that your power supply remains operational even when subjected to the harshest environmental conditions, contributing to its long-term reliability. This power supply proudly boasts an 80 Plus Gold Certification, achieved through meticulous engineering and the inclusion of high-quality Japanese capacitors and other premium components. This certification translates to superior energy efficiency, reducing heat generation and electricity costs while delivering a stable and clean power supply to your PC components, ultimately prolonging their lifespan. The innovative axial-tech fan design is another noteworthy feature, as it incorporates a smaller fan hub that facilitates longer blades and a barrier ring that increases downward air pressure. This sophisticated design not only enhances cooling efficiency but also minimizes noise levels, ensuring that your system remains cool and quiet even during the most intense gaming sessions. cable management is a breeze thanks to the fully modular etched cables. These not only simplify the installation process but also help maintain a neat and organized interior for your PC build, improving overall airflow and aesthetics. The ASUS TUF Gaming 850W Gold power supply is a meticulously crafted solution, bringing together military-grade components, innovative cooling technologies, and comprehensive PCB protection. It's a reliable powerhouse that ensures your gaming rig receives efficient, durable, and uninterrupted power, promising years of exceptional performance for your gaming and PC enthusiast needs.

full_description:
ASUS ROG LOKI SFX-L 750W 80 Plus Platinum Power Supply

The ASUS ROG LOKI SFX-L 750W 80 Plus Platinum Power Supply is a high-performance power supply designed for Intel Form Factor and ATX 3.0 standards. With dimensions of 125 x 125 x 63.5 mm, it is a compact power supply that fits easily into small-form-factor builds. It has an efficiency rating of 80Plus Platinum, which means it is highly efficient and reduces energy consumption. The ASUS ROG LOKI SFX-L 750W 80 Plus Platinum Power Supply comes equipped with a range of protection features, including OPP/OVP/UVP/SCP/OCP/OTP, ensuring that your system components remain safe from overloading, short-circuits, and other potential hazards. It also meets ROHS standards, making it free from hazardous materials that can harm the environment. This power supply has an AC input range of 100-240Vac and a DC output voltage of +3.3V, +5V, +12V, -12V, and +5Vsb, with a maximum load of 20A, 20A, 62.5A, 0.8A, and 2.5A respectively. The combined load capacity is 110W, 110W, 750W, 9.6W, and 12.5W. The total output power is 750W, which is sufficient for most high-end gaming PCs and workstations. The ASUS ROG LOKI SFX-L 750W 80 Plus Platinum Power Supply comes with a range of connectors, including MB 24/20-pin x 1, CPU 4+4-pin x 2, PCI-E 16-pin x 1, PCI-E 8-pin x 3, SATA x 6, and PERIPHERAL x 4, making it compatible with a wide range of motherboards and other components. It also features AURA SYNC and ARGB lighting for customizable aesthetics and an 0dB fan button for silent operation.

The ASUS ROG THOR 1000P2 GAMING 1000W 80 Plus Platinum II Gaming Power Supply features MB 24/20-pin x 1, CPU 4+4-pin x 2, PCI-E 12-pin x 1, PCI-E 6+2-pin x 8, SATA x 12, and PERIPHERAL x 6 connectors. They can pipe up to 600W of power to PCIe Gen 5.0 graphics cards. This Power supply is equipped with a 135mm Axial-tech fan with PWM control delivers lower noise and keeps thermals in check. The fan impeller spins on a dual ball bearing setup that will last up to twice as long as a sleeve bearing design. The PWM-controlled fan shuts off entirely when the PSU load is 50% or below to reduce noise output. Thor II cooling upgrades result in a coveted Lambda A++ noise rating, confirming the latest iteration wields menacing power in absolute stealth. The ASUS ROG Thor 1000W Platinum II utilizes low-ESR Japanese capacitors to ensure efficient operation. These upgrades enable an 80 PLUS Platinum certification, which guarantees 89% efficiency at 100% load and 92% efficiency at 50% load. The increased efficiency results in less heat, reduced fan noise, and increases reliability. The ASUS ROG THOR 1000P2 GAMING 1000W 80 Plus Platinum II Power Supply comes with a built-in OLED panel that makes it easy to tune your system for the best performance and efficiency. title: ASUS ROG THOR 1600T 1600W 80Plus Titanium Full Modular Power Supply
cat_seo_title: Asus Power Supply Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Asus Power Supply at the best price in Bangladesh, purchase your favourite Asus PSU from our shop. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
ASUS ROG THOR 1600T 1600W 80Plus Titanium Full Modular Power Supply

The ASUS ROG THOR 1600T is a high-performance power supply designed for extreme gaming and computing setups. It is equipped with top-of-the-line features and premium components to deliver maximum power efficiency, superior cooling, and reduced noise levels. To achieve the prestigious 80 Plus Titanium Certification, the power supply is constructed with 100% Japanese capacitors and other high-quality components. This ensures exceptional power efficiency and reliability, making it an ideal choice for power-hungry systems. The ROG THOR 1600T is its ROG heatsinks, which cover critical components and contribute to lower temperatures. By effectively dissipating heat, these heatsinks not only enhance the power supply's performance but also help to minimize operational noise. The power supply is equipped with a 135mm Axial-tech fan that features PWM control. This advanced cooling system not only delivers effective heat dissipation but also operates at reduced noise levels. The fan adjusts its speed according to the thermal demands, keeping the system cool without creating unnecessary noise. The ASUS ROG THOR 1600T is its OLED display, which provides real-time monitoring of power draw. This allows users to keep track of power consumption and ensure that their system is running optimally. The power supply incorporates Gallium nitride (GaN) MOSFETs, which offer improved efficiency and lower switching losses compared to traditional silicon transistors. This enables the ROG THOR 1600T to deliver massive amounts of current while minimizing wasteful energy consumption. To ensure precise control and rapid response to load changes, a digital controller is integrated into the power supply, enabling lightning-fast adjustments to the GaN power array. The PWM-controlled Axial-tech fan is designed to optimize airflow, allowing it to move 21% more air compared to conventional fans. This results in efficient cooling for critical components, even at lower fan speeds. Additionally, when the PSU load is below 50%, the fan automatically shuts off, further reducing noise levels during low-demand scenarios. The ASUS ROG THOR 1600T 1600W 80Plus Titanium Full Modular Power Supply is a top-of-the-line choice for enthusiasts and gamers who demand exceptional performance, efficient power delivery, effective cooling, and reduced noise levels. With its premium components, advanced features, and thoughtful design, it stands as a powerful solution for high-end rigs that require nothing short of the best.
